content: I just finished OSUT for 31B. I am home now on orders for Home town recruiting. THen off the FT Drum. I have a wife and 4 kids. We currently live in Arizona. With deployment being on the horizon more then likely, id like to be able to leave my family by our family ect... So... Is there ANYWAY for me to swap duty stations? IE, anywhere in the southwest... FT Huaccua (spelling is wrong) possibly FT Bliss or Irwin?

content: Grab her collar and drag her if necessarry ... show her who the man is. Really though, there's no way to know if you'll enjoy that post or not w/ out going there. That part of NY is really very nice. Get out and look around. Don't worry if base housing is available or not. You'll be draining the DFAS budget of $1160 a month for BAH Don't believe me? See here: BAH & Per Diem rates To be a true mil dependant, she has to experience at least one deployment on her own. Make sure you teach her EVERYTHING you do before you leave. i.e. mow the grass, etc. Nothing chapped my chummies more than a dependant calling me to ask for simple around the house help because her hubby didn't teach her how to start a mower or weed wacker.
